overview: This version contains lyrics in English.  "Signal of Distress" on how computers are taking over our lives! "Moments" which gives dating tips to young couples "Did Charlie Make a Monkey Out of You?"  where evolution is shown as people in Planet of the Apes masks "Mother, Let Me Live!" shows a woman considering an abortion until she sees a ghostly image of her child "Kathy Don't Go" which illustrates the satanic barcode theory using a supermarket "He's Coming Soon!" gives the benefits of joining the cult with a cameo from Jesus "There's a New World We're Making!' which is apparently filled with dancing
tagline: Seven music videos with religious themes, created by the Family International aka Children of God, for the Asian market.
title: SOS
